title: The Information War Heats Up
description: Putin makes the unsubstantiated claim that Ukraine is preparing to use a “dirty bomb.”
dc:creator: Carole Landry

media:content.media:credit: Alexei Babushkin/Sputnik, via Agence France-Presse — Getty Images
